metadata.title: CVE-2016-1000027 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - negligible.
metadata.description: Pivotal Spring Framework 4.1.4 suffers from a potential remote code execution (RCE) issue if used for Java deserialization of untrusted data. Depending on how the library is implemented within a product, this issue may or not occur, and authentication may be required.

notes.note: seth-arnold> Unsafe java deserialization, appears disputed by Pivotal

criterions.comment: libspring-java package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
